actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 1690) entitled "A bill for the relief of Farmers Chemical Association, Incorporated" to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 1690, entitled "A bill for the relief of Farmers Chemical Association, Incorporated," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 1690) entitled "A bill for the relief of Farmers Chemical Association, Incorporated" to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
